text: "Day by Day" is a 1997 single released by Regina Saraiva. ==Chart performance== The song reached #11 on Billboard's Hot Dance Music/Club Play. Note: Billboard incorrectly lists "Day By Day" as a hit for American singer Regina, who last charted in 1988 and had retired from the business at the time of this single’s American release. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (1997) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- ! scope="row"|Italy (Hit Parade Italia) |align="center"|3 |- |- ! scope="row"|UK Singles (Official Charts Company) |align="center"|98 |- ! scope="row"|UK Dance (Official Charts Company) |align="center"|38 |- |- ! scope="col"| Chart (1998) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"|Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) |align="center"|91 |- |} ==References== Category:1997 singles Category:Regina "Queen" Saraiva songs Category:English-language Italian songs Category:Eurodance songs Category:1997 songs
title: Day by Day (Regina song)
